Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.database

Class AssetColumns

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.database.AssetColumns
  • public class AssetColumns
extends Object
    The columns available to clients for querying the Asset database.

      • AUDIO_BITRATE

        public static final String AUDIO_BITRATE
        The audio bitrate of a Segmented HSS Asset. Some segmented asset types have a separate audio and video bitrate. For these assets, the audio bitrate has an appropriate value. Otherwise it is zero. This is a read only Long field, set when the Asset is created.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • VIDEO_RESOLUTION

        public static final String VIDEO_RESOLUTION
        The selected video bitrate of a downloaded segmented asset.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SEGMENT_COUNT

        public static final String SEGMENT_COUNT
        The total number of Segments contained in a Segmented Asset. This is a read only Integer field, set when the Asset is created.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SEGMENT_COMPLETED_COUNT

        public static final String SEGMENT_COMPLETED_COUNT
        The total number of Segments that have downloaded. This is a read only Integer field, updated by Virtuoso as the segments complete.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SEGMENT_TARGET_DURATION

        public static final String SEGMENT_TARGET_DURATION
        The target duration of Segments contained in a Segmented Asset. This is a read only Integer field, set when the Asset is created.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SEGMENT_DOWNLOAD_ENCRYPTION_KEYS

        public static final String SEGMENT_DOWNLOAD_ENCRYPTION_KEYS
        Whether the encryption keys of a Segmented Asset should be downloaded. This is a read only Integer field (0 = false, 1 = true), set when the Asset is created.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONTENT_LENGTH

        public static final String CONTENT_LENGTH
        The content length of a Segmented HLS Asset. This is a read only Long field, updated by Virtuoso when it receives the Content-Length HTTP Header.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        The creation time of an Asset, specified in seconds since epoch. This is a read only Long field, set when the Asset is created.

      • HTTP_STATUS_CODE

        public static final String HTTP_STATUS_CODE
        The last HTTP status code received for an Asset during download. This is a read only Integer field, updated by Virtuoso during the download of an asset.
        See Also:

        public static final String FILE_PATH
        The last file path of a downloaded Asset. This is a read only String field, updated by Virtuoso.

        The current download status of an Asset. This is a read only Integer field, updated by Virtuoso.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ERROR_COUNT

        public static final String ERROR_COUNT
        Tracks the number of errors that have occurred during the download of an Asset. Once this field reaches 3 downloads are no longer attempted on the Asset. This is a read only Integer field, updated by Virtuoso.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • QUEUE_POSITION

        public static final String QUEUE_POSITION
        The position of an Asset within the download queue. This is a read only Integer field, updated by Virtuoso.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • AUTO_CREATED

        public static final String AUTO_CREATED
        Whether the Asset was created internally by Virtuoso, e.g: creation of a subscribed item. This is a read only Integer field (0 = false, 1 = true), set when the Asset is created.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SUBSCRIBED

        public static final String SUBSCRIBED
        Whether the Asset is part of a subscription. This is a read only Integer field (0 = false, 1 = true), set when the Asset is created.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FEED_UUID

        public static final String FEED_UUID
        The UUID of the feed an Asset belongs to. This is a read only String field, set when the Asset is created.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EAP

        public static final String EAP
        (Expiry After Play or 'EAP') Amount of time (in seconds) this asset will remain available to the user after it has been first played. As soon as possible after EAP has elapsed, Virtuoso will delete this asset. Note: For EAP windowing to work, Virtuoso must know when the asset is first played. It's your responsibility to register a play-start Event with Virtuoso or update the FIRST_PLAY_TIME field.
        This is a Long field that can be updated through the AssetManager's content URI.
        See Also:
        IAssetManager, IAssetManager.update(IAsset), Common.Events.addPlayStartEvent(android.content.Context, java.lang.String, java.lang.String), IAsset.getEap(), IAsset.setEap(long), Constant Field Values

      • EAD

        public static final String EAD
        (Expiry After Download or 'EAD') Duration (in seconds) this asset will remain available to the user after it has completed downloading. As soon as possible after EAD has elapsed, Virtuoso will delete the asset.
        This is a Long field that can be updated through the AssetManager's content URI.
        See Also:
        IAsset.getEad(), IAsset.setEad(long), IAssetManager, IAssetManager.update(IAsset), Constant Field Values

      • METADATA

        public static final String METADATA
        Metadata associated with an Asset.
        This is a String field that can be updated through the AssetManager's content URI.
        See Also:
        IAssetManager, IAssetManager.update(IAsset), Constant Field Values

      • START_WINDOW

        public static final String START_WINDOW
        The start window for an Asset. A timestamp, represented as the number of seconds since the unix epoch. A newly-created asset defaults to having a start window of 'now'.
        This is a Long field that can be updated through the AssetManager's content URI.
        See Also:
        IAssetManager, IAssetManager.update(IAsset), IAsset.getStartWindow(), IAsset.setStartWindow(long), Constant Field Values

      • END_WINDOW

        public static final String END_WINDOW
        The end window for an Asset. A timestamp, represented as the number of seconds since the unix epoch. A newly-created asset defaults to having an end window of Long.MAX_VALUE.
        This is a Long field that can be updated through the AssetManager's content URI.
        See Also:
        IAssetManager, IAssetManager.update(IAsset), IAsset.getEndWindow(), IAsset.setEndWindow(long), Constant Field Values

      • FIRST_PLAY_TIME

        public static final String FIRST_PLAY_TIME
        A timestamp of when the Asset was first played, represented as the number of seconds since the unix epoch. It is the clients responsibility to update this field. It can be updated by either registering a play start event or by using the Asset Manager
        This is a Long field that can be updated through the AssetManager's content URI.
        See Also:
        IAssetManager, IAssetManager.update(IAsset), Common.Events.addPlayStartEvent(android.content.Context, java.lang.String, java.lang.String), IAsset.getFirstPlayTime(), Constant Field Values

      • CUSTOM_HEADERS

        public static final String CUSTOM_HEADERS
        A JSON String representing additional headers that must be added to an Asset's download request. The JSON String is constructed with an object containing a JSONArray named 'headers', each element in the array is a JSONObject where the key is the HTTP header name and the value is the header value to send. 
         
 "{
         \"headers\": [
                         { \"MY-HEADER-NAME\": \"MY-HEADER-VALUE\" },
                         { \"MY-HEADER-NAME2\": \"MY-HEADER-VALUE2\" }
                      ]
 }"

        This is a String field that can be updated through the AssetManager's content URI.
        See Also:
        IAssetManager, IAssetManager.update(IAsset), Constant Field Values

      • CURRENT_SIZE

        public static final String CURRENT_SIZE
        The current size of an Asset in bytes. This is a read only Long field. This field may be generated dynamically by the underlying cursor, it should not be used as part of a database query.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXPECTED_SIZE

        public static final String EXPECTED_SIZE
        The expected size of an Asset in bytes. This is a read only Long field. This field may have been set during the creation of an Asset, however, depending on the type of Asset it may be generated dynamically by the underlying cursor. This field should not be used as part of a database query.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PLAYBACK_URL

        public static final String PLAYBACK_URL
        The URL path for a Segmented Asset manifest. This is a read only String field. This field is generated dynamically by the underlying cursor and should not be used as part of a database query. The returned playback URL does not contain the base address for the VirtuosoClientHTTPService. This can be fetched once the proxy has initialised from Virtuoso#getHTTPProxyBaseUri() and concatenated with the path returned in this field.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HAS_CONTENT_PROTECTION

        public static final String HAS_CONTENT_PROTECTION
        Whether the Asset has content protection. This is a read only Integer field (0 = false, 1 = true), set when the Asset is created.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONTENT_PROTECTION_UNSUPPORTED

        public static final String CONTENT_PROTECTION_UNSUPPORTED
        Whether the Asset uses unsupported content protection. This is a read only Integer field (0 = false, 1 = true), set when the Asset is created.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • IS_LICENSED

        public static final String IS_LICENSED
        Whether all the licenses for the asset have been downloaded. This is a read only Integer field (0 = false, 1 = true), set when the Asset is created.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROTECTION_UUID

        public static final String PROTECTION_UUID
        String representation of the drm protection scheme UUID. May be null.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DURATION_SECONDS

        public static final String DURATION_SECONDS
        The total duration of the Asset, specified in seconds. If the duration is unknown -1 will be returned. This is a read only Long field, updated by Virtuoso.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SEGMENT_ERROR_COUNT

        public static final String SEGMENT_ERROR_COUNT
        The number of Segments that have errors. This is a read only Long field, updated by Virtuoso.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ASSET_PERMISSION

        public static final String ASSET_PERMISSION
        The last permission response received from the Backplane. This is a read only String field, updated by Virtuoso. This field is updated if permissions are required (Max Downloads per Account or Max Downloads per Asset are configured) and once the response has been received from the backplane.

        The response is a Base64 encoded string of a Serialized IAssetPermission Object. To retrieve the Object use the getBase64DeserializedObject method.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FRACTION_COMPLETE

        public static final String FRACTION_COMPLETE
        Current download progress, expressed as a fraction [0...1] where 0 is not started and 1 is complete. This is a read only Double field, updated by Virtuoso.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ASSET_DOWNLOAD_LIMIT

        public static final String ASSET_DOWNLOAD_LIMIT
        The client specified number of times this asset can be downloaded across the entire account.
        This is a Long field that can be updated through the AssetManager's content URI.
        See Also:
        IAssetManager, IAssetManager.update(IAsset), Constant Field Values

      • FASTPLAY_ENABLED

        public static final String FASTPLAY_ENABLED
        Indicates if this asset is configured to support fastplay. This is a read only field, it can only be set during asset creation.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FASTPLAY_READY

        public static final String FASTPLAY_READY
        Indicates if this asset is ready to play using fastplay, meaning that some initial segments have been downloaded. This is a read only field, updated by the download engine.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
